%%%%%%
% Abstract
%%%%%%

\chapter*{\centering ABSTRACT}
%\addtocounter{page}{1}
\thispagestyle{empty}
\pagestyle{empty}   %Abstract may take more than one page, need no page numbers anywhere
\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{ABSTRACT}
 \input{abstract}    %% <==== CHANGE TO YOUR FILENAME
\newpage
\pagestyle{plain}



%%%%%
% Acknowledgements
%%%%%
\chapter*{\centering ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS}
%\addtocounter{page}{1}
\input{acknowledgements}   %% <==== CHANGE TO YOUR FILENAME
\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS}
\newpage

\chapter*{\centering DEDICATION}
%\addtocounter{page}{1}
\input{dedication}   %% <==== CHANGE TO YOUR FILENAME
\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{DEDICATION}
\newpage


%%%%%
% Preface
%%%%%
\chapter*{\centering PREFACE}
%\addtocounter{page}{1}
\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{PREFACE}
\input{preface}   %% <==== CHANGE TO YOUR FILENAME
\newpage
\clearpage

\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{TABLE OF CONTENTS}
\tableofcontents

\listoftables
\newpage

\listoffigures
\newpage
